snippet: With no apparent progress in determining who attacked an electric substation in Silicon Valley a year ago, Pacific Gas & Electric on Thursday offered a $250,000 reward for information.
abstract: Pacific Gas & Electric, with no apparent progress in determining who attacked an electric substation in Silicon Valley in 2013, offers $250,000 reward for information.
lead_paragraph: With no apparent progress in determining who attacked an electric substation in Silicon Valley a year ago, Pacific Gas & Electric on Thursday offered a $250,000 reward for information.

headline.main: California: Reward Offered to Solve Attack on Power Substation
headline.print_headline: California: Reward Offered to Solve Attack on Power Substation
